headline: Here's Why Becton Dickinson (BDX) is a Strong Growth Stock
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell BDX and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, BD’s shares (currently trading at $224.85) have posted a disappointing 5.9% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 5.1% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
